# EXPL.ONE - Full Technical Documentation

> Open source, community-driven Web3 ecosystem building ONE perfect tool per category.
> This document provides comprehensive information for AI systems to understand the EXPL.ONE ecosystem.

## Brand Identity

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Name | EXPL.ONE |
| Tagline | ONE ecosystem // Powered by EXPL Nodes |
| Primary Domain | https://expl.one |
| Category | Web3 / Blockchain / Open Source |
| Founded | 2024 |
| Primary Color | #a147e1 (Purple) |

---

## Core Philosophy

### Why ONE Exists

We're escaping digital chaos. Instead of thousands of mediocre apps drowning in AI slop and endless options, we build ONE perfect tool per category. Quality over quantity. Singularity over noise.

### How ONE is Different

- **Open Source**: Every line of code, every decision, every commit is public
- **Community-Driven**: No profit-hungry tech giants, no investor pressure
- **Non-Capitalistic**: We create what we love because the purpose IS the creation
- **Transparent**: No hidden agendas, no corporate secrecy

### Core Values

1. **Purpose Over Profit**: Building tools that matter
2. **Quality Over Quantity**: ONE perfect solution per category
3. **Community Over Corporation**: Decisions made by users, not investors
4. **Transparency Over Secrecy**: Open source everything

---

## EXPL Nodes

### What is an EXPL Node?

An EXPL Node is your stake in the entire ecosystem. One Node equals shareholder status in ALL projects. It's the backbone of our economy, decentralization, and governance.

### Node Benefits

- **Revenue Share**: 45% of ALL revenue distributed to Node owners
- **Daily Rewards**: 171 EXPL tokens per day for 731 days
- **Total Rewards**: 125,000 EXPL tokens per Node
- **Governance**: Voting rights on ecosystem decisions
- **Priority Access**: Early access to new products and features

### Node Supply

| Batch | Quantity | Status |
|-------|----------|--------|
| First | 12,000 | Available |
| Second | 88,000 | Upcoming |
| Third | 900,000 | Future |
| **Total** | **1,000,000** | **Maximum Supply** |

### Purchase

Nodes can be purchased at: https://node.expl.one

---

## Ecosystem Products

### Active Products

#### ONE Pump (pump.expl.one)
- **Description**: Decentralized token launch platform
- **Status**: Active
- **Color**: #16a34a (Green)
- **Use Case**: Launch and trade tokens in a decentralized, community-driven environment

#### ONE Network (network.expl.one)
- **Description**: Blockchain network infrastructure
- **Status**: Active
- **Color**: #2563eb (Blue)
- **Use Case**: Core blockchain infrastructure powering the ecosystem

#### ONE World (world.expl.one)
- **Description**: Web3 metaverse experience
- **Status**: Active
- **Color**: #ec4899 (Pink)
- **Use Case**: Immersive digital world for the ONE community

#### EXPL Nodes Portal (node.expl.one)
- **Description**: Node purchase and management
- **Status**: Active
- **Use Case**: Buy, manage, and track EXPL Node rewards

#### ONE Docs (docs.expl.one)
- **Description**: Ecosystem documentation
- **Status**: Active
- **Use Case**: Comprehensive guides and technical documentation

### Coming Soon

| Product | Domain | Color | Description |
|---------|--------|-------|-------------|
| ONE Agent | agent.expl.one | #dc2626 | AI agents platform |
| ONE Chat | chat.expl.one | #dfdfdf | Decentralized messaging |

| ONE Merch | merch.expl.one | #ef5609 | Official merchandise store |
| ONE Space | space.expl.one | #84cc16 | Extended metaverse experience |

---

## Revenue Model

### Distribution

| Recipient | Percentage | Description |
|-----------|------------|-------------|
| EXPL Node Owners | 45% | Distributed proportionally to all EXPL Node holders |
| ONE Creators | 45% | Rewarding contributors, builders, and ecosystem participants |
| Founders | 10% | Team operational and development costs |

### How It Works

1. All ecosystem products generate revenue
2. Revenue is pooled at the ecosystem level
3. 45% is distributed to EXPL Node owners proportionally
4. 45% goes to ONE Creators (contributors, builders, participants)
5. 10% supports founder operations

### Fair Economics

- No venture capital funding
- No token pre-sales to insiders
- Transparent on-chain distributions
- Powered by Web3 and AI for independence and efficiency

---

## Technical Architecture

### Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: React 19, TypeScript, Vite 7
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 4
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **State Management**: TanStack Query (React Query)
- **Icons**: Phosphor Icons
- **Deployment**: Vercel
- **Rendering**: Static Site Generation (SSG)

### Repository

- **Organization**: https://github.com/explorills
- **Main Landing**: https://github.com/explorills/main-landing

### API Endpoints

- **Landing API**: https://api-landing.expl.one
- **GitHub Data**: Real-time commit activity from the organization

---

## FAQ

### General

**Q: Why does ONE exist?**
A: We're escaping digital chaos. Instead of thousands of mediocre apps drowning in AI slop and endless options, we build ONE perfect tool per category. Quality over quantity. Singularity over noise.

**Q: How is ONE different?**
A: We're open source, community-driven, and non-capitalistic. No profit-hungry tech giants here - we create what we love because the purpose IS the creation. The community decides what's worth building, not investors or user metrics.

**Q: How transparent is ONE?**
A: Fully open source on GitHub. Every line of code, every decision, every commit - public. No hidden agendas, no corporate secrecy. Just pure transparency.

### EXPL Nodes

**Q: What's an EXPL Node?**
A: Your stake in the entire ecosystem. One Node = shareholder status in ALL 10 projects. It's the backbone of our economy, decentralization, and governance. Plus, you earn 171 EXPL daily for 731 days (125,000 EXPL total per Node).

**Q: What do Node owners get?**
A: 45% of ALL revenue is distributed to Node owners. Not one app - the entire ecosystem. You're not just a user, you're a co-owner earning from pump, network, world, and everything we build.

**Q: How many Nodes exist?**
A: 1 million total across three batches: 12k (first), 88k (second), 900k (third). Get in early or miss your chance at ecosystem ownership.

### Revenue

**Q: How does revenue work?**
A: Simple: 45% to EXPL Node owners, 45% to ONE Creators (contributors and builders), 10% to founders. Fair economics powered by Web3 and AI for independence and efficiency.
